columns.dc:description: If the surrogate has been digitized, the name of the digital file
columns.name: File_Name

columns.dc:description: Specifies that this surrogate's image should be used as the primary object image.
columns.name: IsPrimary

columns.dc:description: Identifies the view of the subject above, e.g., 'from above,' 'looking North,' 'from the apse.'  Also used in describing part/whole relationships (eg., page x of y). Use controlled vocabulary.
columns.name: View_1
